A very solid expansion that gives a good amount more Half Life to enjoy while sufficiently changing up and adding to the gameplay to make it feel distinct from the base game. The new weapons are pretty fun to mess around with and Race X is a interesting new type of enemy that feels rather different from all the aliens you fight in the base game. It's also pretty interesting to see the different perspective of the marines, there are several moments where you see events from the base game from another angle. Something I specifically I don't like are the new AI squad mates who can fight alongside you as their pathfinding is not great, they are easily killed, and they are capable of friendly fire but they are required in several segments to cut through doors or heal other squad members who then cut through doors. However much like regular Half Life, the good far outweighs the bad.
I absolutely love this one. It's small but it strafes far from the original with new ideas and seeing stuff from the marines perspective is very cool, recommended if you like Half-Life
A lot of fun. Compared to the base game, this is an awesome expansion, and Half-Life is already pretty awesome so ... 9/10

Muy buen juego y lo considero la mejor expansión del original, a pesar de que los haters de la saga de Half-Life, los fans por moda y los payasos incultos y degenerados no lo reconozcan como canonico, considero que, hablando como uno de los verdaderos fans de la saga, este juego es canon y Adrian Shephard merece aparecer en algun proximo juego de la franquicia, por lo menos como una referencia o easter egg, lo recomiendo a quienes se adentran a la saga de Half- Life ya que es una experiencia epica y para ser de esa epoca es muy bueno.

Classic Half Life expansion. Tougher enemies, weirder weapons, cool level designs and useless NPC ally soldiers who blow you apart as soon as you accidentally step in their line of fire, Shorter than Half Life but what it lacks length it makes up in substance. Not as good as Blue Shift.
Muy buena expansión la verdad hicieron un buen trabajo Gearbox con Valve para traer este juego.

[b] SPIN-OFF AT ITS FINEST [/b]

Awesome spin-off of Half-Life. Not an expansion as some would call it since it’s a stand-alone game, where you play another protagonist. One that kind of mirrors Gordon Freeman’s steps in Half-Life.

And a full-fledged game this is, very well polished, with a huge scope (almost as long as Half-Life itself), new mechanics, new weapons, and new monsters. Everything you’d expect after playing Half-Life and more. Some, to this day, even prefer Opposing Force to the original.

A game to remind us of the recent past, where franchises relied on actual expansions, proper spin-offs and the like.
This is a good expansion pack to a good game.

Imagine Half Life 1 was the DLC and Opposing Force is the main game because this might as well be a whole new experience.

Opposing Force is just an absolute must play, it builds on everything that was present in Half Life 1 and then continues to blow your mind with the vast amount of new weapons, traversal opportunities and enemy types that are introduced and the challenges that these present.

There's no argument, if you're going to buy Half Life 1 then you must buy Opposing Force with it - or you could buy the Half Life 1 Anthology like I did because you then get Blue Shift for free! ;)

[i] There was an issue with the mouse locking when I first loaded the game up, this can be fixed by going into 'Options', the 'Mouse' tab and clicking the checkbox which says 'Raw mouse input' - the issue never happened again and otherwise the game is flawless :) [/i]

Beklediğimin aksine gayet uzun ve güzel oyundu. Ama oyun eski, yani bazı yerlerde baya zorluyor. Buradan son bossun Allah belasını versin.

Oynadığım işletim sistemi Windows 10. Bu oyunun yapımcısı Valve ile çok çalışmış bir firma. Oyunda başlangıçta verdiği tabanca süper. Öncelikle oyun bitince oyunda bir şeyler eksik hissediyorsunuz. Bazı yerler gereksiz zorken bazı yerler gereksiz şekilde çok kolay. Ben bitirdiğime şükür ettim. Oyun daha çok Doom' a benziyor. Her yerden canavar çıkıyor, haritada boş kalan her yere gıcık kapacağınız şekilde aynı canavarları koymuşlar, tamam bitti derken aynı canavardan tekrar çıkıyor tekrar tekrar ve tekrar çıkıyor artık bıkıp oyunu kapatıyorsunuz anlayacağınız tek amaç öldürmek. Kafa kullanacak bir bölüm tarzı yok. Half Life 1' e kıyasla Valve 'nin yapmadığı bariz şekilde anlaşılıyor. Silah çeşitliği var ama doğrusunu söylemek gerekirse 3 silahla çok rahat oyun bitiriliyor. Sonlara doğru çok uzun zaman hep gece görüş kullanmak zorunda kaldım ortam çok karanlıktı(keşke fener olsaydı), gözlerim çok yoruldu. Genel anlamda hiç zevk vermedi. Çok hata var özellikle asansör hataları beni yedi bitirdi, asansördeyken bu hata yüzünden asla hareket edemiyorsunuz. Bu yüzden her asansöre gelmeden önce save yapmanızı öneririm. Ben beğenmedim. Half Life 1' in grafikleri ile oyun oynamayı seviyorsanız alın derim ama sevecek kişi bence yoktur. Bölüm tarzı çok güzel olsaydı ve hatalar olmasaydı önerirdim. Son olarak Valve bu yazıyı okur musun ? bilmem. Bu zamana kadar oyunlarda ortaklaşa iş yapmışsınız. Ama bu adamlara zamanında fikir olarak yardım etseydiniz, bölüm tasarımı bence çok güzel olabilirdi. Oyuna çok güzel eklemeler yapmışlar. Silahlar tam olarak bilim kurgu oyununa benzemiş. Özellikle silah olarak canavarları kullanma konusunda iyi düşünmüşler. Benden bu kadar.

Jogar HL: Opposing Force é quase tão obrigatório quanto jogar seu jogo base "Half-Life".

Lançado como o 1º conteúdo adicional pra HL, o jogo apresenta uma variedade enorme de inimigos e armas, além de puzzles e uma aprofundação no sistema de "aliados/ajudantes NPCs" que já existia no jogo base mas não tão explorado como essa expansão fez. O protagonista que controlamos é Adrian Shepard, um dos soldados HECU enviado pra Black Mesa durante os incidentes mostrados no jogo base Half-Life. Por mais que seja a melhor expansão, recomendo uma promoção pra compra-lo

Starting to play in Opposing Force after passing Black Mesa is somewhat unusual. I saw what the original Half-Life looked like at one time. But still, Opposing Force is unique in that it allows you to look at the events of the original game from the other side. DLC is very short, it takes place in literally 2-3 hours. There are almost no heads, and those that are copy those from the original. The plot so much faster develops, more adrenaline in German. Yes, and the final fight is the same fast. In general, how DLC Opposing Force looks worthy, given that by the standards of 1999 this can generally be called a separate game. It's only a pity that Shepherd is now remembered only by fans of the series. 9/10.

In meinen 6,5 Stunden kann ich sagen dass der Anfang mir von der Geschichte wie auch dem Gameplay gefallen hat. Allerdings gibt es einige Jump n' run Elemente und dieses Spiel ist dazu nicht gerade freundlich was die Steuerung angeht.
Hinzu kommt z.B. das vorletzte oder drittletzte Level dass einem einige Gegner entgegen wirft aber dem Spieler kaum Munition sowie Healthpacks zur verfügung stellt.
Dies war einer der Level an dem ich wie vorher mindestens 20 Minuten verbringen hätte können. Weil man mit 12HP aller höchstens drei Treffer einstecken kann bevor man von vorne anfangen muss. Manuelle Speicherstände waren dabei eine große Hilfe.

Die letzten zwei/drei Level habe ich dann schließlich mit dem Command "notarget" abgeschlossen und den Bosskampf am Ende hat mich überrascht. 
[spoiler] Man hat keine Abwechsulng und macht die gleiche Tätigkeit für ca 5 mal, wenn nicht sogar mehr. Es gab keine Musik und man hatte nur dieses Ekelhafte Geräusch von dem Vieh im Ohr. Trotz "Noclip" und "fly" hat dieser Bosskampf sich so gezogen dass ich das Gefühl hatte 10 Minuten wären vergangen.

Für Fans des Franchises sowie Spieler die eher schwere und retro bevorzugen ist es einem Blick wert aber für mich gab es schlicht zu viele frustrierende Stellen.

good game. great gameplay and level design. bosses aren't too difficult, just a repitition of hitting them in specific points. Enjoyed it for what it was. Black Ops assassins were beyond OP, acting as pure bullet sponges who could absorb explosions and entire magazines. Get the sniper to one-shot them though. Most annoying thing was the lack of health, and the spawn points which would spawn you in front of 5 enemies with 10hp over and over again until you managed to get the one perfect run which would let you pass. Overall a great game in one of the best series of all time

The story of Half-Life but from the perspective of Corporal Shepard who is trying to survive at the same time as Gordon Freeman . This DLC kept every single good element from the first game and expanded it by more weapons and it brought us more challenging but also more annoying enemies . The multiplayer is also same as in the original Half-Life , it is same in it´s core but with different maps and more weapons .

This game's really good, half life is better with the gameplay and puzzles, but this game has a slicker hud and better weapons and more weapon variety overall. It feels more polished and there's a cutscene at the beginning which is pretty cool.

По моему мнению это лучший аддон для Half-Life.
Честно говоря ради этого аддона я и проходил оригинал. Как только я увидел этот аддон в интернете то сразу желал его купить, уж на столько он мне понравился.
Сингл: оружия здесь просто немерено: гаечный ключ, нож, винтовка, пулемёт, споровый метатель и еще много всего. Кто бы что не говорил, но локации здесь явно разнообразны и хорошо запоминаются. Из врагов здесь целая новая раса и два босса, а также черные оперативники (это те вроде ассасинок). Сюжетная линия пересекается с оригинальной (как не странно) и имеет свои особенности. А фишек и механик здесь сколько. Прохождение займет около 12 часов и мне небыло скучно на протяжении всего геймплея.
Мультиплеер: с ним все печально, а если в краце то он мертвее дезматча (который классик). Зато ctf режим есть.
Вывод: обезательно к прлхождению всем кто прошел оригинал и кому он понравился. Игра явно стоит своих денег и я не жалею что сыграл в данный проект. (ну те чё, 133 рублей жалко на шедевр?)

interesting setpeices and good voice acting. will say its definetly harder than normal half life, but still very much manageable. though it gets VERY monsterclosety in the later.... 3 4ths and honestly i was save scumming and staying around 2-14hp ALOT. so uh, yeh, fyi, i was on easy. so watch your step.

Uno de los mejores shooter que jugué, y sin dudas el mejor half life, ambientación excelente, un catálogo de armas muy superior al original, historia muy buena y que calza perfectamente con la de gordon, y que añade más contexto a esta, pero que a la vez es excelente por si sola, enemigos muy buenos y variados, diseño de niveles colosalmente bueno, y jugabilidad que si bien es la misma de half life 1, no deja de ser gratificantemente buena, 10/10.
chebre

En Half-Life Oppsing Force tomas el papel de un militar llamado Adrian Shepard (que ve a saber si es humano por que para tener 22 años de edad y ser un militar experimentado... Este wey no es el segundo Master Chief por que no quiere, o bueno, por que el G-Man lo secuestró xD) quien se dirigía con su equipo a matar a todo alien y personal de Black Mesa luego del accidente en la cámara de pruebas ocurrido en Half-Life. Pero su helicóptero fue atacado y se termina estrellando para después despertar dentro de las instalaciones y su objetivo es escapar con vida de ese lugar.

Cabe decir que él nunca fue informado de que lo enviaron para también matar a las personas que aún seguían vivas en Black Mesa ya que su helicóptero como dije antes, fue derribado.

Entorno al gameplay es como en Half-Life 1 algunos enemigos los matas con plomo y otros con cabeza, se agregan unas cuantas armas nuevas, aquí no tienes que combatir militares ya que eres uno, pero eso no quiere decir que no habrá nuevas amenazas.
